languages.text: {n}Вопрос, кажется, вызывает легкую растерянность у Инцендии. Она начинает перекладывать бумаги с приговорами, а затем с сомнением произносит:{/n} "Три... недели. Суд не прекращается ни днем, ни ночью, так что чувство времени ускользает от меня".

{n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅似乎对你的问题有些困惑。她不断地将签名的审判书从一叠移到另一叠，之后不确定地开了口。{/n}“三个……星期了吧？法庭日夜不停地进行着宣判，我已经对时间失去概念了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅似乎对你的问题有些困惑。她不断地将签名的审判书从一叠移到另一叠，之后不确定地开了口。{/n}“三个……星期了吧？法庭日夜不停地进行着宣判，我已经对时间失去概念了。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}あなたの質問を聞いたインセンディアは、少しばかりまごついている様子だった。彼女は署名された文章を山から山へと移しながら不確かな言葉を口にする。{/n}「3…週間だ。裁判は朝晩行われている。つい、時間の感覚を失いがちなのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの質問を聞いたインセンディアは、少しばかりまごついている様子だった。彼女は署名された文章を山から山へと移しながら不確かな言葉を口にする。{/n}「3…週間だ。裁判は朝晩行われている。つい、時間の感覚を失いがちなのだ」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia parece ligeramente perpleja ante tu pregunta. Empieza a mover sentencias firmadas de una pila a otra y dice, con incertidumbre:{/n} «Tres... semanas. El tribunal trabaja día y noche, así que he perdido la noción del tiempo».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia parece ligeramente perpleja ante tu pregunta. Empieza a mover sentencias firmadas de una pila a otra y dice, con incertidumbre:{/n} «Tres... semanas. El tribunal trabaja día y noche, así que he perdido la noción del tiempo».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Incendia wirkt etwas perplex ob deiner Frage. Sie beginnt, unterschriebene Strafurteile von einem Stapel auf den anderen zu legen und sagt unsicher:{/n} "Drei ... Wochen. Das Gericht tagt unaufhörlich, Tag und Nacht, daher ist mir mein Zeitgefühl abhanden gekommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia wirkt etwas perplex ob deiner Frage. Sie beginnt, unterschriebene Strafurteile von einem Stapel auf den anderen zu legen und sagt unsicher:{/n} "Drei ... Wochen. Das Gericht tagt unaufhörlich, Tag und Nacht, daher ist mir mein Zeitgefühl abhanden gekommen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}Votre question semble laisser Incendia perplexe. Elle se met à déplacer des sentences signées d'une pile vers une autre, puis répond d'une voix incertaine :{/n} « Trois... semaines, je dirais. Comme la cour travaille jour et nuit, j'ai perdu la notion du temps. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre question semble laisser Incendia perplexe. Elle se met à déplacer des sentences signées d'une pile vers une autre, puis répond d'une voix incertaine :{/n} « Trois... semaines, je dirais. Comme la cour travaille jour et nuit, j'ai perdu la notion du temps. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: {n}İncendia, sorun karşısında hafiften afallamışa benziyor. İmzalanmış hükümleri bir balyadan bir diğerine koyuyor, ardından emin olmayarak yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Üç... Hafta. Mahkeme gece gündüz sürüyor, o yüzden de zaman mefhumum kayboldu."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia seems slightly perplexed by your question. She starts moving signed sentences from one stack to another, then says uncertainly,{/n} "Three... weeks. The court carries on day and night, so my sense of time eludes me."
